package.name: Net_Socket
package.description: Net_Socket is a class interface to TCP sockets. It provides blocking and non-blocking operation, with different reading and writing modes (byte-wise, block-wise, line-wise and special formats like network byte-order ip addresses).
package.notes: - Fix variable name in setWriteBuffer() (PEAR Bug #11039) - Use %d for ints (PEAR Bug #11202) - Fix passing context to socket for both PHP 4 and PHP 5 - Catch errors from fsockopen() that happen before the socket is actually opened (Jan Scheider, jan@horde.org) - Restore the original track_errors setting - Silence unsilenced fwrite call - Update PHPDoc
